title: Champion Mastery Token missing?
body:
So I just got an S- on Heimer, who I've already gotten to Rank 5, and yet I didn't receive a Rank 6 token like usual.

Any help?

replies.body:
Champion Mastery tokens can only be earned on Summoner's Rift normal and ranked matches. You can learn more about the Mastery system on the [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide).

I hope that helped!
